DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Safety Ginger Extract Compared With Loratadine Treatment Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.detailed_description: The double blind randomize control trial study . Patients meet inclusion criterion fall exclusion criterion randomly place experimental group , receive ginger extract capsule , control group , receive loratadine 42 day .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients moderate allergic rhinitis ( itch nasal obstruction , watery nasal discharge , sneeze congestion ) minimum total nasal symptom score 5 point 2 . These patient respiratory disease tuberculosis , nasal polyp . 3 . These patient history disease : heart disease , kidney disease , liver disease , epilepsy , high blood pressure severe asthma . 4 .
